title: Onigamiden (Legend of the Millennium Dragon)
synopsis: A 15-year-old boy travels back in time—over 1,200 years ago to the Heian period—and faces a war between oni (demons) and humans in the former Japanese capital of Kyoto.
staff: [['Kawasaki, Hirotsugu', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Screenplay']], ['Arakawa, Naruhisa', ['Script']], ['Fukuhara, Miho', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Yamashita, Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']]]
